member.summary: Adds a Prometheus provider to the factory
member.param: The factory to add the application insights provider to
The user friendly and unique name of the provider
The host name that will server the data
The port that the metrics server willb exposed on
The URL suffix the metrics server will be exposed on (default: metrics/)
The number of metrics in a bucket, use multiples of 500 for optimal performance
The number of buckets to keep before aging out
The duration in seconds of a pulse summary
